feed.title: YTPTube Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.2.0
entry.content:
• 8db8e86 updated yt-dlp to 2025.06.30 by arabcoders
  • 1d6f810 updated frontend packages by arabcoders
  • 31aa15e Added file browser actions by arabcoders
  • b70cd47 error message update by arabcoders
  • 26455b6 Merge pull request #319 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.2.1
entry.content:
• 27476a3 wait until config is loaded to check for default preset. Fix #320 by arabcoders
  • a5812a7 Download selected as archive when downloading multiple files. Implements #321, Update #310 by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.2.3
entry.content:
• 3219517 do not show merge commits when updating github release. by @arabcoders
  • 4849301 fix incorrect test display. by @arabcoders
  • a448fc4 cast file to string for mimetype by @arabcoders
  • eb440df minor fixes for running on windows. by @arabcoders
  • f8bbcc4 removed no longer used file for native build by @arabcoders
  • 24de1fc more changes for native builds by @arabcoders
  • 4d194fe update app.spec to include all uv packages. by @arabcoders
  • e36552e wip by @arabcoders
  • ef2094f finalize changes for native apps. by @arabcoders
  • 8674b7c turn off console for prod builds by @arabcoders
  • 860fb81 support running in linux qt webview by @arabcoders
  • 9ef8f47 add notice about webview wrappers by @arabcoders
  • 8081eb6 fix release updater by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.2.4
entry.content:
• 9536e02 correctly upload artifacts by @arabcoders
  • 354a7b3 followup fix for webview builds by @arabcoders
  • cdac850 fix artifact version tagging by @arabcoders
  • 69c4216 followup fix for artifacts release by @arabcoders
  • ea9c547 fix by @arabcoders
  • 2c47361 remove sha256sum generation by @arabcoders
  • 7a55702 split windows and nix oses packaging. by @arabcoders
  • 37dab36 support running in pywebview in windows. by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.2.5
entry.content:
• ed77a59 clean up language usage. by @arabcoders
  • e7dad28 change default opacity to 0.95 by @arabcoders
  • 61cbd4a update default.vue to use ts by @arabcoders
  • 1239643 minor update to store fields by @arabcoders
  • 9ff9735 Added the ability to add item in paused state by @arabcoders
  • 543d713 update external packages by @arabcoders
